32#ifndef _LINUX_PLATFORM_DEVICE_H_
33#define _LINUX_PLATFORM_DEVICE_H_
34
35#include <sys/device.h>
36#include <sys/bus.h>
37
38#define NUM_PLATFORM_RESOURCE 2
39
40struct platform_device {
41 device_t pd_dev;
42 uint64_t id;
43
44 bus_dma_tag_t dmat;
45 unsigned int nresource;
46 struct {
47 bus_space_tag_t tag;
48 bus_addr_t start;
49 bus_size_t len;
50 } resource[NUM_PLATFORM_RESOURCE];
51};
52
53static inline device_t
54platform_device_dev(const struct platform_device *platformdev)
55{
56
57 return platformdev->pd_dev;
58}
59
60#endif /* _LINUX_PLATFORM_DEVICE_H_ */
61
